episodes.title: Follow Henry Hildebrandt, not the PPC? Ray Tinsman is the "Messiah"? Baptist are full of the Devil?
episodes.description:
Henry Hildebrandt uses the political rallies and protests to recruit more members for his cult. The Church of God Restoration believes that they are the only true church and others need to "come out" from their churches and join them to be saved. They want people to follow Hildebrandt and not the PPC (People's Party of Canada). They claim that their chief apostle Ray Tinsman is their "Messiah".
The full video of the sermon mentioned in this video, can be found here: https://cogrcult.neocities.org/falseapostles.html.

episodes.title: Henry Hildebrandt, Ray Tinsman y S. Hargrave, ¿falsos apóstoles? Iglesia de Dios Rest., ¿una secta?
episodes.description: Éstas son algunas de la enseñanzas que la Iglesia de Dios Restauración le oculta al público en general y las cuales deberían de preocupar a los cristianos. Henry Hildebrandt oculta muchas de las ensañanzas que antes predicaba, de visitantes que visitan a la iglesia de él en los úlitmos meses. Ésta no es sólo una típica iglesia conservadora, muchas de sus enseñanzas no son bíblicas.

episodes.title: Henry Hildebrandt, Ray Tinsman, faulsche Apostel? Gem. Gottes Restoration eene Sakjt? Plautdietsch
episodes.description:
Dies sind einige der Lehren, die die Gemeinde Gottes Restoration vor der Öffentlichkeit verbirgt und über die sich Christen Gedanken machen sollten. Henry Hildebrandt verbirgt viele seiner Lehren vor den Besuchern, die in den letzten Monaten in seine Kirche gekommen sind. Dies ist nicht nur die durchschnittliche konservative Kirche, viele ihrer Lehren sind überhaupt nicht biblisch.


Vollständige Videos mit Beschreibungen finden Sie hier: https://cogrcult.neocities.org/falseapostles.html

episodes.title: Henry Hildebrandt, Ray Tinsman and S. Hargrave, false Apostles? Church of God Restoration a Cult?
episodes.description:
These are some of the teachings the Church of God Restoration hides from the general public and that Christians should be concerned about. Henry Hildebrandt is hiding many of the teaching he used to preach about, from the visitors that have come to his church in the last few months. This is not just the average conservative church, many of their teachings are not biblical at all.

Narration by: Jeri
https://www.reverbnation.com/jeristern

Full videos with descriptions can be seen here: https://cogrcult.neocities.org/falseapostles.html

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Church-of-God-Restoration-Cult-108791478162537

episodes.title: Wea es Henry Hildbrandt von dee Gottes Gemeinde Restoration? Plautdietsch
episodes.description: (Plautdietsch) Henry Hildebrandt protestiert gegen die Regierungsverordnungen in Ontario, aber ist es ein Kampf für die Freiheiten oder ein Werbegag des Kultes namens Church of God Restoration? Wissen seine Unterstützer, wer er ist?

episodes.title: ¿Quién es Henry Hildbrandt de la Iglesia de Dios Restauración?
episodes.description: Henry Hildebrandt protesta en contra de las órdenes del gobierno de Ontario, pero es una lucha por los derechos or es un truco publicitario de la secta llamada Iglesia de Dios Restauración? ¿Saben sus seguidores quién es él?

episodes.title: Who is Henry Hildebrandt of Church of God Restoration?
episodes.description:
Henry Hildebrandt protests against the government orders in Ontario, but is it a fight of freedoms or is it a publicity stunt for the cult called Church of God Restoration? Do his supporters know who he is?
Although not affiliated with this work, a big part of this video comes from the hard work and effort Adam Pamer has put into gathering information about this cult. Thank you Adam!
Adam is a former member of the cult and his wife and children were taken from him by the cult, and to top if up the cult's leaders made false accusations against him to get him arrested. Of course the lies didn't hold in court. You can read more about Adam's story and the evil deeds of the cult at Adam's website and social media:
website: cultbusters.us
Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRR_BeY6O1I5ECTQxuJ6gzA/videos
Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2346275585659863/
